languages.text: Наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всем противникам вокруг Осколка К'тан. Все противники пытаются {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} и в случае неудачи оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.
languages.original_text: Damages all enemies around the C'tan Shard. All enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Наносит урон всем противникам вокруг Осколка К'тан. Все противники выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.

Наносит урон всем противникам вокруг Осколка К'тан. Все противники выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damages{/g} all enemies around the C'tan Shard. All enemies must attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
languages.original_text: Наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всем противникам вокруг Осколка К'тан. Все противники пытаются {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} и в случае неудачи оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Damages all enemies around the C'tan Shard. All enemies must pass a dodge test or fall prone.
Damages all enemies around the C'tan Shard. All enemies must pass a dodge test or fall prone.
{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damages{/g} all enemies around the C'tan Shard. All enemies must attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Daña{/g} a todos los enemigos alrededor del fragmento de C'tan. Todos los enemigos deben superar una prueba de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} o caer {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damages{/g} all enemies around the C'tan Shard. All enemies must attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Daña a todos los enemigos alrededor del fragmento de C'tan. Todos los enemigos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} o caer {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.

languages.text: 星神碎片对周围所有敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。被伤害的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，否则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damages{/g} all enemies around the C'tan Shard. All enemies must attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 星神碎片对周围所有敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。被伤害的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，否则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。

languages.text: ク＝タン・シャードの周りの全ての敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。全ての敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}判定を成功させなければ{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damages{/g} all enemies around the C'tan Shard. All enemies must attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ク＝タン・シャードの周りの全ての敵にダメージを与える。全ての敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ドッジ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を成功させなければ{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Beschädigt{/g} alle Feinde um das C'tan-Fragment herum. Alle Feinde müssen versuchen, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g}, sonst werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damages{/g} all enemies around the C'tan Shard. All enemies must attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Beschädigt alle Feinde um das C'tan-Fragment herum. Sämtliche Feinde müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} bestehen, sonst werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.

languages.text: Inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à tous les ennemis qui entourent l'Écharde C'tan. Tous les ennemis doivent {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} ou subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damages{/g} all enemies around the C'tan Shard. All enemies must attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Inflige des dégâts à tous les ennemis qui entourent l'Écharde C'tan. Tous les ennemis doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} ou ils subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.

languages.text: C'tan Parçası'nın çevresindeki tüm düşmanlara {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Tüm düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} teşebbüsünde bulunmalıdır. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilirler{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damages{/g} all enemies around the C'tan Shard. All enemies must attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
